items.name: Cashmere IPA
items.desc:
12 or 24 x 440ml Cans.
A hoppy, hazy double dry hopped IPA. It has a staggering 21g/l of dry hop including Mosaic, Citra, Ella and of course the lead hop Cashmere. Expect big tropical flavours with a smooth grapefruit finish.
Artwork by James Hayes

items.name: DDH Pale
items.desc:
This beer is part of the Wild Card Project, an ongoing collaboration between the brewery and artists, designers and creatives.
Shipping: W/C 7/9/20
Brewed in collaboration with Earth Station Brewery. A hoppy, hazy double dry-hopped IPA made with Simcoe and Enigma. With a dry hop rate of 21g/l, expect big tropical flavours with a fresh berry finish. It's a juicy citrus IPA with notes of coconut, clementines, lemon zest from Citra and Sabro hops.
This product is on pre-order and will be dispatched from the 7th of September.
"The heart of my design language definitely reflects my early interests in Japanese manga illustrations. As a young teen I was hugely inspired by manga artists such as Katsuhiro Otomo and Akira Toriyama. They both had styles that definitely stood out from the rest. Katsuhiro and his amazing facial expressions and design choices for the facial features such as his nose and eye styles, and Toriyama for his bold design choices with the large wide eyes, huge eyebrows and exaggerated muscle proportions. These characteristics really inspired me to create a design that would speak a similar language."
- Cory Samuels, Artist
You can see Cory's other work here : @neter_krafts

items.name: Enigma IPA
items.desc:
This beer is part of the Wild Card Project, an ongoing collaboration between the brewery and artists, designers and creatives.
Shipping: W/C 7/9/20
A hoppy, hazy double dry hopped West Coast IPA made with Simcoe and Enigma. With a dry hop rate of 21g/l, expect big tropical flavours with a fresh berry finish.
This product is on pre-order and will be dispatched from the 7th of September.
"There are a variety of things that inspired me to make these designs. The one artist that has definitely influenced these designs is Henri Matisse and his portrait of Madame Matisse (or Green Stripe). Not only is this piece for me really reminiscent of the Japanese manga art I grew to love, but the impressionists use of mark making that describe the form of the face beautifully and the extreme boldness of the painting, with the harsh reds and prominent purples."
- Cory Samuels, Artist
You can see Cory's other work here : @neter_krafts

items.name: Lager
items.desc:
4.4% abv - 330ml can
Our Lager is a Czech style Pilsner with a twist. The Joker is fresh and crisp and made from English malts and hops (including Target, Epic and Pioneer).
Awarded BRONZE in the SIBA 2017 South East Regional Keg Heats

items.name: Mixed Specials Case
items.desc:
12 or 24 x Cans. Contents subject to change.
Cashmere IPA, 5.8% - 440ml - A hoppy, hazy double dry hopped IPA. It has a staggering 21g/l of dry hop including Mosaic, Citra, Ella and of course the lead hop Cashmere. Expect big tropical flavours with a smooth grapefruit finish.
Waimea IPA, 5.2% - 330ml - Brewed in collaboration with Beardless Beer Week, this is a hoppy IPA that puts Waimea front and centre and is packed full of pine and citrus flavours. Awarded BRONZE at SIBA SE Keg Competition 2020.
Lime Berliner Weisse, 4% - 440ml - A sour, hazy Berliner Weisse. Made with copious amount of lime juice for a tart, zingy & refreshing sour wheat beer.
Passionfruit Gose, 4.8% - 440ml - This fruity Gose is modelled after the traditional sour beers of Northern Germany. A sour, salted, wheat beer. Towards the end of fermentation, we've added copious amounts of Passionfruit, for a beer that's fresh, zesty and packed full of tropical flavour.
Table Beer, 2.7% - 440ml - Low on alcohol, packed full of tropical flavours. Awarded CHAMPION at SIBA SE Keg Competition 2020.
12 Mixed Case - Contains 8 440ml cans and 4 330ml cans
24 Mixed Case - Contains 16 440ml cans and 8 330ml cans

items.name: Simcoe IPA
items.desc:
This beer is part of the Wild Card Project, an ongoing collaboration between the brewery and artists, designers and creatives. For this instalment, we worked with upcoming local artist Cory Samuels.
Shipping: W/C 7/9/20
Dry hopped with Simcoe, Citra and Zeus. This is a dank, juicy IPA with punchy tropical fruit flavours of Pineapple and Mango with a fiercely zesty undertone.
This product is on pre-order and will be dispatched from the 7th of September.
You can see Cory's other work here : @neter_krafts

items.name: The Wild Card Project: Cory Samuels
items.desc:
The Wild Card Project is an ongoing collaboration between the brewery and artists, designers and creatives. We aim to celebrate unsung heroes, overlooked brilliance and those with a more unusual approach. For our first instalment, we are working with an upcoming local artist Cory Samuels.
Shipping: W/C 7/9/20
Enjoy a case containing all of the beers from this project, which includes:
DDH Pale, 4.5% - Brewed in collaboration with Earth Station Brewery. A juicy citrus IPA with notes of coconut, clementines, lemon zest from Citra and Sabro hops. Fermented cool and double dry hopped for clean, tropical and zesty flavour.
Simcoe IPA, 7.4% - Dry hopped with Simcoe, Citra and Zeus. This is a dank, juicy IPA with punchy tropical fruit flavours of Pineapple and Mango with a fiercely zesty undertone.
Enigma IPA 5.5% - A hoppy, hazy double dry hopped West Coast IPA made with Simcoe and Enigma. With a dry hop rate of 21g/l, expect big tropical flavours with a fresh berry finish.
You can see Cory's other work here : @neter_krafts

items.name: Waimea
items.desc:
12 or 24 x 330ml Cans.
Brewed in collaboration with Beardless Beer Week, this is a hoppy IPA that puts Waimea front and centre and is packed full of pine and citrus flavours.
Awarded BRONZE at SIBA SE Keg Competition 2020.
